problem.markdown:
You can use this template as a guide to the simple editor markdown and OLX markup to use for checkboxes problems. Edit this component to replace this template with your own assessment.
>>Welches alter gehört GenerationX? 1945-1964 oder 1965-1999 oder 2000-2010. <<
[x] 2000-2010 [ ] 1965-1999 [ ] 1945-1964

choiceresponse.p: You can use this template as a guide to the simple editor markdown and OLX markup to use for checkboxes problems. Edit this component to replace this template with your own assessment.
